title: Electric field strength from uniform distribution

content.question: A uniform spherical charge distribution has radius R. Which of the following is true of the electric field strength due to this charge distribution at a distance r from the center of the charge?

choices.label: It is greatest when r = R/2.
It is directly proportional to r when r > R.
It is directly proportional to r when r < R.
It is directly proportional to r 2.

content.answer: It is directly proportional to r when r < R.

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
